subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: LeBron James’s performance in the N.B.A. playoffs marked a rite of passage for his generation - a generation that has been hammered by the previous one for its choice of music and modes of behavior.
snippet: LeBron James’s performance in the N.B.A. playoffs marked a rite of passage for his generation - a generation that has been hammered by the previous one for its choice of music and modes of behavior.
